adDetails: Hi there My investors have hard money sitting around and ready to use, If you have a scenario residential or commercial, that you would like to run by me, get in contact with me. 65-70% LTV(maybe 75%), 1003 loan application, Prelim Title report, and credit report is all that is needed .Not fico driven, but will need a credit report anyway. If you have equity and need a fast close, get in touch with me. Thank you for your time and looking forward to hearing from you real soon John
